amendment.description: To enhance military readiness by creating a reserve fund to provide TRICARE benefits for members of the Selected Reserve of the Ready Reserve, fully offset through reductions including unobligated balances from Iraqi reconstruction, and a reserve fund to provide Montgomery GI Bill benefits to members of the Selected Reserves.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2731 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2731 proposed by Senator Graham SC. (consideration: CR S2493-2498; text: CR S2493) To enhance military readiness by creating a reserve fund to provide TRICARE benefits for members of the Selected Reserve of the Ready Reserve, fully offset through reductions including unobligated balances from Iraqi reconstruction, and a reserve fund to provide Montgomery GI Bill benefits to members of the Selected Reserves.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2731 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2731 proposed by Senator Graham SC.
